name: Deacon St. John
desc: The protagonist of the entire saga. A former enforcer for the Mongrels MC, he rides the broken road from Belknap to Wizard Island searching for his wife.

name: Boozer
desc: Deacon's brother-in-arms and closest friend. He is the emotional core of the 'He's My Brother' storyline, surviving severe injuries to stand by Deacon.

name: Sarah
desc: The driving force behind Deacon's journey in 'I Remember'. Presumed dead in the outbreak, she is eventually discovered deep in Militia territory.

name: Iron Mike
desc: The pacifist leader of Lost Lake. In the 'We've All Done Things' storyline, he tries to forge a future where survivors hold onto their humanity.

name: Rikki Patil
desc: A vital lieutenant at Lost Lake. She plays a key role in 'Earning Our Keep', driving the camp's survival and fixing everything Deacon breaks.

name: Raymond 'Skizzo' Sarkis
desc: Head of Security at Lost Lake and a major antagonist. His paranoia and ambition in the 'Some Kinda Freak Expert' arc ultimately threaten the entire camp.

name: Col. Matthew Garret
desc: The leader of the Deschutes County Militia on Wizard Island. He wages a fanatical 'Holy War' against the Freakers in the game's final act.

name: James O'Brian
desc: The face of NERO. Appearing throughout the 'Finding NERO' storyline, his secret missions reveal the terrifying truth behind the virus.

name: Mark Copeland
desc: The leader of the Copeland's Camp in Belknap. A conspiracy theorist who preaches 'The Truth' over the radio waves to anyone listening.

name: Ada Tucker
desc: The overseer of the Hot Springs camp. A strict disciplinarian who believes 'Gear Up for the Ride' means forced labor is the price of safety.

name: Carlos
desc: Formerly known as Jessie, he leads the Rippers in the 'Ripped Apart' storyline, hunting Deacon and Boozer to settle an old MC vendetta.
